text:
Dear User,
Your account has been suspended due to suspicious activity. Please click the link below to verify your information and restore access.
http://malicious-link.com
Thank you,
Support Team

Hi,
I am the CEO. I need you to send me the employee payroll data immediately. This is confidential.
Thanks,
John

Congratulations! You've won a $1000 gift card. Click here to claim your prize: http://phishingsite.com
Act fast, offer expires soon!

Hello,
Your package could not be delivered. Please provide your address and payment details to reschedule delivery.
Best,
Courier Service

Hi team,
Please find attached the agenda for tomorrow's meeting.
Best,
Jane

Dear Customer,
We noticed a login attempt from a new device. If this was not you, please reset your password immediately using the link below.
http://fake-reset.com
Security Team

Hey,
Can you send me the notes from last week's class?
Thanks!
Hello, this is Microsoft support. We have detected unusual activity on your account. Please provide your bank details to secure your account.
Your PayPal account will be locked unless you verify your password and billing information here: http://fake-paypal.com
URGENT: Your tax refund is ready. Please send your bank account number to receive your funds.

Hi,
I am your IT administrator. Please reply with your login credentials to resolve a security issue.

Dear Customer,
You have won a free cruise! Click the link to claim your prize: http://scam-link.com

Hello,
This is your bank. We need you to confirm your account number and PIN to avoid suspension.

Hi,
Can you send me the password for the shared drive?

Dear Employee,
Please update your direct deposit information using the attached form.

Hi Alex,
Let's meet for lunch tomorrow at noon.
Best,
Sam
Reminder: Your dentist appointment is scheduled for next week.

Team,
Please review the attached project plan and send feedback.
Happy birthday! Hope you have a wonderful day.

Hi,
Can you send me the slides from yesterday's meeting? Thanks!
